nodes.text: The BB-22 Salvage Droid was a model of humanoid-shaped salvage droid that saw use during the Cold War. A number of BB-22 droids worked with S7-H7 Slicing Droids and JT-65 Salvage Droids in the Barasin Refuse Yards on the planet Balmorra.
BB-22 Salvage Droids appear as enemies in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, where they can be found in the Barasin Refuse Yards in the Imperial version of Balmorra.
